# Probability Tree

## Assignment I


::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_430603d8d304ff0b3de3d38007161aa6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_S = 0.3
P_NotS = 0.7
P_SUnderT = 0.2
P_SUnderNotT = 0.8
P_NotSUnderT = 0.6
P_NotSUnderNotT = 0.4
```
:::

* $P(T \cap S) =$

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_4f76a96886d1d2069ea103b9016f1558'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_IntersectionST = P_S * P_SUnderT
```
:::

* $P(T \cap \bar{S}) =$

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_afc860a8cf12703a91f395a50ffe9ef6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_IntersectionNotST = P_NotS * P_NotSUnderT
```
:::

* $P(\bar{T} \cap S) =$

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_6b05a7312057e15f145558532a6f2678'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_IntersectionSNotT = P_S * P_SUnderNotT
```
:::

* $P(\bar{T} \cap \bar{S}) =$

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_0891ade9886281ce97e983176bdc525d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_IntersectionNotSNotT = P_NotS * P_NotSUnderNotT
```
:::

* $P(T \cap S) + P(T \cap \bar{S}) + P(\bar{T} \cap S) + P(\bar{T} \cap \bar{S}) =$

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_8aeb52c03e1b889989e9242552e887ba'}

```{.r .cell-code}
P_IntersectionST + P_IntersectionNotST + P_IntersectionSNotT + P_IntersectionNotSNotT
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 1
```
:::
:::
